name: Ext_R5_ResearchSubject_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ResearchSubject.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchSubject.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who or what is part of study
element.definition: The record of the person, animal or other entity involved in the study.
element.comment: `ResearchSubject.subject` maps to R4B `ResearchSubject.individual`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Specimen)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Substance)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProduct)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
